snippet: As ambassador to Chile in the 1980s, Mr. Barnes aggressively promoted democracy there and clashed frequently with the country’s dictatorial president, Gen. Augusto Pinochet.
abstract: Harry G Barnes Jr, top US diplomat, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: As ambassador to Chile in the 1980s, Mr. Barnes aggressively promoted democracy there and clashed frequently with the country’s dictatorial president, Gen. Augusto Pinochet.

headline.seo: Harry G. Barnes Jr., Envoy to Chile and India, Dies at 86
headline.main: Harry Barnes Jr., a Top U.S. Diplomat, Is Dead at 86
headline.print_headline: Harry Barnes Jr., 86, a Top U.S. Diplomat
